concept.title: Define the Operation Header Attribute
concept.shortdesc: To write to MongoDB, you need to define the MongoDB operation header attribute for each record. Use an Expression Evaluator in the pipeline to define the operation header attribute.

conbody.p: Use the following header to define the operation to perform: SDC.MONGODB.OPERATION

For each record, set the operation to one of the following values:
INSERT
UPSERT
DELETE
